Package com.bytedesk.call.call

Class CallCallService

java.lang.Object
com.bytedesk.call.call.CallCallService
@Service @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="bytedesk.call.freeswitch", name="enabled", havingValue="true", matchIfMissing=false) public class CallCallService extends Object
